title: Chanur's Legacy
description: National best-selling author C.J. Cherryh continues her highly acclaimed series with a new generation of alien encounters.A game of interstellar politics in which Hilfy Chanur and her vessel Legacy are commissioned to transport a small, mysterious religious object. The price is extremely generous, perhaps too generous.Praise for the Chanur series: A tour de force...quintessential SF. (The Magazine of Fantasy and Science FictionOne of the best science fiction tales ever. (Minneapolis Star and Tribune)
author: C.J. Cherryh
